title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-1.26 - Special-purpose pools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-1.26 - Special-purpose pools

State Regulations

Pools for persons with physical disabilities shall provide safe entry and exit from the pool. All surfaces shall be free of sharp edges. These pools shall be operated and maintained in accordance with the requirements specified in section
6-1.29, item 15.3, of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
6-1.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
